content: based on the famous line from a winter s tale by shakespeare the best stage direction ever perfect for that literature lover in your life pattern is worked in the overlay mosaic crochet style the pattern contains a brief tutorial on mosaic crochet on page 4 materials the wall hanging can be worked with any yarn and the appropriate hook for the weight of yarn the completed project in the picture was made using size 4 worsted weight yarn and a 5 mm hook you will need approximately 700 yards of the main color and 300 yards of the pattern color if you are using size 4 yarn size the final size of your wall hanging will depend on the weight of yarn and the size of the hook that you use the worsted weight yarn size is approximately 24 x 34
